title: Client not opening; only shows crash report no matter how many times I open it?

embed.description: Explore isaac r's photo on Flickr!

body:
So I attempted to open League this morning to play a game, and I haven't played in a good while so when I opened it the client took a while to update. It finished, so I clicked "Launch", and all it gave me was the attached picture -- a crash report. So i clicked "Ok" and attempted to re-open League. Same crash report. Clicked OK. Tried to re-open it. Repeat about 5 times until I realized this damn thing wasn't gonna open.
So I deleted LoL and re-installed it. Waited for it to update. Clicked "Launch", expecting it to take me to the login page but NOPE. SAME THING HAPPENED. I'm really lost as of what to do, re-installing hasn't helped, re-opening hasn't helped, clicking "OK" on the crash report page hasn't helped, and all I wanna do is play League. I am running a Macbook Pro (don't give me shit for it lol) and I'd really appreciate any help.
Thanks!

_**EDIT:**_ Tried for the 9th time today and still nothing. However, on the crash report page, under "Problem Details and System Configuration", it says this:

replies.body: I think I might have been able to spot the main problem. It looks like you're running OS Version: Mac OS X 10.7.5 which may not be up to par for League's [**minimum recommended specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654#section-mac).

Okay, thank you so much! That makes sense as I got this computer a very long time ago. Is there any way for me to play League on this computer, possibly an older version or something or would I need a whole new computer to play league?
Thank you again!

You are going to need a newer brand. I would recommend a minimum of a 2012 model, as your current one isn't even fast enough to load it and even if it did, you are going to be lagging as heck. ( I have multiple macs which I have tested leagues on)
